# parish_stats
    
  
```{r example-parish_stats}
parish_stats("TS001") |> 
  head()

parish_stats("TS004", c("100001", "100006"))
```

  

## map_parish_stats

```{r examples-map-parish-stats}
map_parish_stats(c("TS004", "TS001"))
map_parish_stats(c("TS004", "TS001"), parish_codes = "100006")
```
